Organics:
 
The femme was caught by suprise, but returned the kiss.  She was tired, but she enjoyed the moment.  She broke the kiss with a mischivious smile.
"You have something to do, remember?  You spend all day with me in the corridor, now can you?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

windlord returned the kiss, with passion

<DIV>The femme was caught by suprise, but returned the kiss.  She was tired, but she enjoyed the moment.  She broke the kiss with a mischivious smile.</DIV>
